title: Win Mother’s Day With These Beauty Gift Ideas
description: From LED light therapy to a luxe hand cream.

html:
Best Luxury Hand Cream

Dior J’adore Les Adorables Hand, Nail & Décolleté Cream

Hands are more commonly susceptible to showing age. Keep mom’s money makers enveloped in the conditioning mix of jasmine wax and cotton extract, along with the petally notes from the J’adore eau de parfum.

Best Luxury Skincare Duo

La Mer The Essential Discovery Collection

Moms deserve the best–and the best is La Mer. This reparative skin care kit offers rejuvenated, smoother skin in four steps.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Alcohol-Free Citrus Perfume

Yves Saint Laurent Libre L'eau Nue

If she’s a fan of the OG YSL Libre perfume, the brand’s latest iteration arrives alcohol-free, meaning a stronger, long-lasting burst of citrus and lavender awaits.

Best Curling Iron Sets

T3 Twirl Trio Interchangeable Custom Blend Ceramic Three Barrel Professional Curling Iron Set

She spent years attempting to create whatever style your heart desired. Return the favor by teaching her how to achieve a range of curls using T3’s interchangeable Switch Kit Wave Trio, which comes with three barrel sizes, nine different heat settings, and frizz-free technology for long-lasting results.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Floral Perfume

Parfums de Marly Delina La Rosée Eau de Parfum

This perfume is fit for a queen, which makes it the perfect Mother’s Day gift. It contains notes of peony, bergamot, and vanilla for a scent as sweet as she is. Plus, the bottle is so beautiful that it basically wraps itself.

Best LED Face Mask

CurrentBody Skin LED Light Therapy Mask

Even the most technologically challenged moms can navigate this light therapy mask, which combines anti-aging red and near-infrared light therapy to help eliminate wrinkles.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Transportable Diffuser

Vitruvi Move Diffuser

Transform mom’s home into a spa oasis with a soothing diffuser. This model can easily move from room to room, thanks to its sleek cordless design.

Best Sensual Fragrance

Marc Jacobs Daisy Eau So Intense Eau de Parfum

Now 15% Off

A grown-up twist on the original Daisy perfume makes the perfect spring fragrance. Notes of sweet strawberry, pear, and rosebud hearts are balanced by soft vanilla and green moss.

Best Skincare Routine

Dr. Barbara Sturm The Discovery Set

Your mom deserves the A-list treatment, and there’s nothing more A-list than Dr. Barbara Sturm. This pack of minis is a great way to familiarize her with the brand. Whichever product is her favorite, get her the full-size one for her birthday.

Best Retinol Serum

Lancôme Rénergie C.R.x. Triple Serum Retinol

Signs of aging are just evidence of a life well-lived. As we age, our skin loses elasticity, but this retinol-based serum combines the star ingredient with peptides and vitamin C to improve texture and radiance.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Spring Scent

Diptyque L'Eau Papier Eau de Toilette

A perfume is a surefire way to put a smile on someone’s face, especially this scent from Diptyque. L’Eau Papier is a soft musk that’s as refreshing as it is seductive.

Best Lemon-Scented Body Wash

Sothys Invigorating Shower Gel

For a burst of energy upon waking up, Sothy’s shower gel delivers a lemon and petitgrain one-two punch. Glycerin stars as the primary moisturizing ingredient, leaving you feeling and smelling good.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Functional Styling Tool

BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium StyleSwitch Ionic Multi-Styler & Hair Dryer

This styling kit comes with a smoother for sleek, straight styles, as well as a round and paddle brush for added volume, and a diffuser for curls.

Best Nourishing Body Scrub

Alo Renew & Glow Body Polish

Smooth, baby-soft skin isn’t relegated to the warm-weather months. In this conditioning body scrub, the sugar exfoliants swirl in a bed of an expansive blend of oils (amla, coconut, grapeseed, to name a few) and shea butter to restore and maintain moisture.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Brightening Essence

Ranavat Botanics Radiant Rani Brightening Saffron Facial Essence

Mom’s beauty will stand the test of time, but here’s a brightening essence to enhance her radiance a touch more. Formulated with niacinamide and squalane for nourishment, as well as a fermented ayurvedic blend, this essence can visibly brighten and soothe the skin.

Best Light Therapy Sauna Blanket

HigherDose V4 Infrared Sauna Blanket

Whether she’s a workout buff or enjoys the finer things in life, give her the gift of one hour of muscle recovery, detoxification, and relaxation in the comfort of her own home.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Hair Steamer

Pattern Beauty The Hair Steamer

Depending on your hair’s porosity, some products may require extra support to penetrate deeply into the hair shafts. Pattern Beauty’s latest hair tool brings the innovation, featuring a multi-pronged spout intended to make combing through the hair fuss- and tangle-free. Other attachments include a diffuser for those with thicker, curlier hair.

Best Vanity Mirror

Huonul Makeup Mirror Vanity Mirror

Mom should see herself as clearly as you see her. This makeup mirror lights up and has magnifying sections, which makes it easy to apply product, pluck stray eyebrow hairs, or simply admire your own beauty in its reflective surface.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Hair Repair Mask

R+Co R+Co BLEU De Luxe Reparative Masque – Restores Texture, Strength, and Shine to Dry, Damaged Hair, Hydrates, Calms, Smoothes, Seals Cuticles, Mends Split Ends, 5 oz

Blood orange, primrose extracts, and tamanu and maracuja oils revive dull hair and seal cuticles in this giftable hair hero.

Best Hydrating Hair Oil

Oribe Gold Lust Nourishing Hair Oil

Elevate her self-care routine with a luxurious oil that works on dry, damaged, and color-treated hair.
